definition: insect that eats into books, clothing etc/moth-eaten/worm-eaten
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. a door hinge never becomes worm-eaten/constant activity prevents decay (idiom)
to decay and be eaten by worms etc/to overhoard grain so that it rots
lit. flowing water does not rot, nor a door-hinge rust (idiom)/fig. constant activity prevents decay
pinyin: liu2 shui3 bu4 fu3 , hu4 shu1 bu4 du4

sentences.english: The Red turpentine bark beetle, Dendroctonus valens LeConte, is an invading pest of pines in China.
sentences.chinese: 紅脂大小蠹是我國近年來重要的入侵害蟲。

sentences.english: Pelargonic acid has a obvious antifeedant action to the imago of Pissodes punctatus Langor et Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 壬酸對華山松木蠹象成蟲有明顯的拒食作用。

sentences.english: The study aimed to control Cossus orientalis gaede with cornus officinalis as host by biological pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 研究生物農藥防治以山茱萸爲寄主的芳香木蠹蛾。

sentences.english: Xylosoandrus germanus Blandford was a important pest discovered recently, which attacked the grapevines.
sentences.chinese: 光滑足距小蠹是國內葡萄樹上一種新發生的重要害蟲。

sentences.english: However, the actual operation, there are still many drawbacks exist.
sentences.chinese: 但現實操作中仍有許多蠹弊存在。

sentences.english: The dermestidae belongs to another family.
There are Cydia and Installer sources available, so use whichever you are comfortable using.
sentences.chinese: 有蘋果蠹和安裝資金來源，所以使用哪您輕鬆地使用。
